article.description: Josh Nzeakor scored 20 points on 8-for-9 shooting to lead Lamar in a 90-47 win in its season opener over Howard Payne on Friday night.
article.headline: Lamar cruises to 90-47 win over Howard Payne
article.linkText: Lamar cruises to 90-47 win over Howard Payne
article.story: BEAUMONT, Texas -- Josh Nzeakor scored 20 points on 8-for-9 shooting to lead Lamar in a 90-47 win in its season opener over Howard Payne on Friday night. Colton Weisbrod added 15 points to go with eight rebounds and Nick Garth had 14 points for Lamar, which hit 51 percent of its 61 shots from floor in the win. The Cardinals went 20 of 33 from the free throw line. Leading 53-22 at the break, Lamar continued to pull away in the final 20 minutes. Howard Payne, an NCAA Division III school, was paced by Khyce Randall's 12 points and eight rebounds. Rickey Guillory added 10 points and had 10 rebounds for the Yellow Jackets, who were held to just 28 percent shooting from the field (14-50) and hit just 2 of 13 from long range.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
